message.content:
1. The final analysis included 101 patients.
2. The study was investigating the effect of isomaltulose on HbA1c at 12 weeks.
3. The HbA1c level for patients consuming sucrose was 7.39 ± 0.78%.
4. The HbA1c level for patients consuming isomaltulose was 7.24 ± 0.76%.
5. The regression coefficient (b) was 0.02.
6. The 95% confidence interval for the regression coefficient was -0.21 to 0.25.
7. The P-value of the study was 0.844.
8. Isomaltulose did not significantly affect HbA1c at 12 weeks.

messages.content:
Statement: In the final analysis comprising 101 patients, isomaltulose did not significantly affect HbA1c at 12 weeks (sucrose: 7.39 ± 0.78%; isomaltulose: 7.24 ± 0.76%; regression coefficient [b]: 0.02 [95% CI: −0.21 to 0.25], P = 0.844).

List all the facts we explicitly know from the statement. Make each fact as atomic as possible.
